page.title: 10Education at Glenalmond
page.content: {History:}The O-level is taken by about 60% of the 5th form. About half of the senior boys take either History or Ancient History A-level. {Geography:}Many Lower-6th geographers attend holiday camps in the Lake District and the school leads some occasional trips abroad. The 2nd most popular A-level. {Classics:}Latin or General Classics O-level is taken by about 70% and a trip to Italy or Greece is made every second year. {English:}Compulsory throughout. {Languages:}French, Spanish and German are taught. {Sciences and Maths:}Emphasis is put on practical work. Biology A-level is the 3rd most popular, but Physics and Maths are also popular. {Other subjects:}Include compulsory Divinity, General Studies and C.D.T.
